name: Shinobi: Souls and Dreams
description:
Shinobi Links is the name of my visual novel which aims to create a satisfactory experience for the players, with many possible routes for each heroine in a game that makes you feel that every decision you make is important.

Consider giving my patreon a check if you like this project (there are weekly updates!)

Patreon: Warrior Novels | creating Shinobi: Souls and Dreams | Patreon
